                                                        failed

        parameters {
            name
            in
            description
            required
            schema {
                type
            }
        }
        get {
            x_linode_grant
            tags
            summary
            description
            operationid
            x_linode_cli_action
            security {
                personalaccesstoken
            }
            responses {
                _200 {
                    description
                    content {
                        applicationjson {
                            schema {
                                type
                                description
                                properties {
                                    id {
                                        type
                                        readonly
                                        description
                                        example
                                        x_linode_cli_display
                                    }
                                    date {
                                        type
                                        readonly
                                        format
                                        description
                                        example
                                        x_linode_cli_display
                                    }
                                    usd {
                                        type
                                        readonly
                                        description
                                        example
                                        x_linode_cli_display
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                default {
                    description
                    content {
                        applicationjson {
                            schema {
                                type
                                properties {
                                    errors {
                                        type
                                        items {
                                            type
                                            description
                                            properties {
                                                reason {
                                                    type
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                }
                                                field {
                                                    type
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            x_code_samples {
                lang
                source
            }
        }
    }
    accountpaymentspaypal {

            tags

            description

            security {
                personalaccesstoken
            }
            requestbody {
                description
                required
                content {
                    applicationjson {
                        schema {
                            type
                            required
                            description

                                    type
                                    description
                                    example
                                }

                                    type
                                    description
                                    example
                                }

                                    type
                                    description
                                    example
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

                                        description

                                        description

                            }

                                                    example

                                        readonly
                                        example

        x_linode_cli_command
        get {
            x_linode_grant
            parameters {
                name
                in
                description
                required
                schema {
                    type
                    minimum
                    default
                }
            }
            tags
            summary
            description
            operationid
            x_linode_cli_action
            security {
                personalaccesstoken
            }
            responses {
                _200 {
                    description
                    content {
                        applicationjson {
                            schema {
                                type

                                    data {
                                        type

                                            type

                                                    example
                                                    readonly

                                                }

                                                    x_linode_filterable

                                                    description

                                                    minlength
                                                    maxlength
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                status {
                                                    type
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    readonly
                                                    enum
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                    x_linode_cli_color {
                                                        ready
                                                        not ready
                                                        default_
                                                    }
                                                }
                                                size {
                                                    x_linode_filterable
                                                    type
                                                    readonly
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                filesystem {
                                                    type
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    enum
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                created {
                                                    type
                                                    format
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    readonly
                                                }
                                                updated {
                                                    type
                                                    format
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    readonly
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                    page {
                                        type
                                        readonly
                                        example
                                    }
                                    pages {
                                        type
                                        readonly
                                        example
                                    }
                                    results {
                                        type
                                        readonly
                                        example
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                default {
                    description

                        applicationjson {
                            schema {
                                type

                                }
                            }

    managedservices {
        x_linode_cli_command
        get {
            x_linode_grant
            tags
            summary
            description
            operationid
            x_linode_cli_action
            security {
                personalaccesstoken
            }
            responses {
                _200 {
                    description
                    content {
                        applicationjson {
                            schema {
                                type
                                properties {
                                    data {
                                        type
                                        items {
                                            type
                                            description
                                            properties {
                                                id {
                                                    type
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    readonly
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                status {
                                                    type
                                                    enum
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    readonly
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                    x_linode_cli_color {
                                                        ok
                                                        disabled
                                                        default_
                                                    }
                                                }
                                                service_type {
                                                    type
                                                    enum
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                label {
                                                    type
                                                    minlength
                                                    maxlength
                                                    pattern
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                address {
                                                    type
                                                    format
                                                    minlength
                                                    description
                                                    example
                                                    x_linode_cli_display
                                                }
                                                timeout {
                                                    type
                                                    minimum
